thread.title: Football: Sanchez's Gunners future is unclear
thread.title_full: Football: Sanchez's Gunners future is unclear

title: Football: Sanchez's Gunners future is unclear
text:
By Mirror Monday, February 13th 2017 at 00:00 
Alexis Sanchez is involved in a transfer tug-of-war between Paris Saint-Germain and Juventus. 
Serie A giants Juventus believe they have a strong chance of signing the Arsenal striker who has only got 18 months left on his current contract. 
Arsenal are fearful that Sanchez will not sign a new deal after offering him a contract worth Â£180,000-a-week but it is still short of his demands. 
Paris Saint-Germain have also sounded out his representatives and believe they can tempt Sanchez to France. 
Juventus are putting together a financial package to make a huge offer at the end of the season and there is a growing feeling that Sanchez could be sold this summer. ALSO READ: Arsene Wenger: Sanchez's goal for Arsenal against Hull was handball 
Arsenal face a major dilemma as to whether to allow Sanchez to run down his contract - or cash in at the end of the season. 
The Chilean netted twice against Hull on Saturday to move to the top of the Premier League goalscoring charts with 17 for the season as the Gunners got back to winning ways following defeats to Watford and Chelsea.
